sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 3: The Shopping Situation</size>

scripts.say: Outside of Port - Nearby Street
It seems like it's been forever since we've been able to shop like this. Commander, how are you doing back there? Can you carry any more?
*giggles* Sorry~ I don't mind carrying stuff, but you know, people will give us weird looks if I'm hauling all those bags around.
Having that said though...
Over there... is that Atago? Atagoooo!
Ugh...
Oh my, if it isn't Choukai and Maya. Are you two out shopping as well?
Yes, we are! We're here to pick out some clothes! Ah, Commander, you're working hard today as well!
By the way, Atago, I heard that a new buffet opened around here not too long ago. After we're all done, we should go check it out together!
In any case, we'll be headed this way... Jeez, Maya, don't just sit there, we've got to head to the next store!
It's not like I even want to buy anything... OW! Don't pull on me! I'm coming, I'm coming... for god's sake...
Sorry for making a scene in front of you~
It's rare to see Maya this grumpy. Is something the matter?
Um, well, when we were at the lingerie shop, there was only one vacant changing room so we had to go in together... The rest is history, I suppose...
Um... Maya? I know it might be hard for you right now, but your body can always change, you know?
That may be the case, but... I don't know why I'm like this either...
Even if you say that... *sigh* Atago, you probably entered this world with huge ol' knockers on you so that's easy for you to say...
The hell did you just say...?
Um, n-nothing at all! C'mon, Choukai, let's bounce!
The two of them hastily beat their retreat.
